reviews.review: Поиграете 2 часа и залипните на несколько лет
i loved this game and it got ruined for me when i was banned one day .

Se você pretende jogar o modo competitivo deste game, desista, está infestado de cheaters e o anti-cheater da valve já não funciona há muito tempo, deixando o jogo extremamente desbalanceado, tornando quase que obrigatório o uso de clientes externos como por exemplo: FaceIT, GamersClub...

Takes a lot of getting used to. Way more realistic than other shooters. Good game.

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is a very fun game, yes. After first purchasing the game I instantly became addicted to it and enjoyed playing the game with mates and just generally having fun also building team-work and listening skills along the way. 

However there are many things Valve needs to fix within the competitive region, even though its been released for many years now, like for example match making taking too long, as an unranked being matched up with master guardians and gold novas, and cheaters. However the game is very fun to play and recommend it.

Very team-based game. make sure you squad up with friends or people that you meet in games that are good, try to learn off of their experiences and let the teach you. Prime is a great investment if you are willing to play the game long-term, there are a few hackers that get through with the prime, but if you get your whole team to vote valve is very strong when it comes to their bans.
